Posts.Content: Was wondering how cyberknife differs from external radiation and how long are each treatment and how many treatments. If anyone has this information. I have one core at 10 pct. psa is 6.0 Gleason 6 i am 65 and have been advised to seriously consider cyberknife. Any info greatly appreciated. Tony
Posts.Title: Cyberknife

Posts.Content: Thank you guys. Yes Ron I am referring to the cyberknife by accuracy. I was interested because I have been told treatment is more precise and takes one to five days as opposed to 44 days of treatment. I also am wondering if with my numbers I could put off treatment to early August. My numbers are age 65 psa 6.0 Gleason 6 one core out of 12 at 10 pct. thank you all very much. Tony
Posts.Title: Cyberknife
